item.title: Help
item.description: Before you create a project, your content will need to exist in Omeka S as items. DataScribe works with the items and items sets in your Omeka S install. You will build datasets using item sets, and these datasets will be made up of items. Creating Omeka S resources Item sets DataScribe uses existing Omeka S item sets as the basis for datasets. Each dataset has one transcription form. You will need to create a unique item set for each form type you intend to create.
